title: Carry Forward of Losses
text: Where a person has an unrelieved loss for a year of income, the loss shall be carried forward to reduce chargeable income in the next year, not exceeding 30%.

title: Reverse Charge on Imported Services
text: The VAT payable by the purchaser of imported services shall be both output and input tax, claimed in the same return period under Section 68(2).

title: Objection to Tax Decision
text: Any taxpayer aggrieved by a tax decision shall file a notice of objection to the Commissioner within 30 days from the date of service.
